mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT s.*, ( 6371 * acos( cos( radians( #{xcor} ) ) * cos( radians( xcor) ) * cos( radians( ycor ) - radians(#{ycor}) ) + sin( radians(#{xcor}) ) * sin( radians(xcor) ) ) ) AS distance FROM store s) DATA WHERE DATA.distance < 3

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT s.*,t.name typeName, ( 6371 * acos( cos( radians( #{xcor} ) ) * cos( radians( xcor) ) * cos( radians( ycor ) - radians(#{ycor}) ) + sin( radians(#{xcor}) ) * sin( radians(xcor) ) ) ) AS distance FROM store s join type t on s.type=t.id where s.type=#{type}) DATA WHERE DATA.distance < 3

select * from( select s.*, m.c from STORE s left join (select store, count(*) c from menu where name like '%' || #{search} || '%' group by store) m on s.no = m.store where (s.name like '%' || #{search} || '%') )
